item.title: 1. A family trapped in the fire
item.description: A father jumps from the window of his home to flee a housefire that kills his family. Feed: https://podcasts.files.bbci.co.uk/p0hvvqqr.rss

item.title: Highlights: #215 – Tom Davidson on how AI-enabled coups could allow a tiny group to seize power
item.description:
Throughout history, technological revolutions have fundamentally shifted the balance of power in society. The Industrial Revolution created conditions where democracies could dominate for the first time — as nations needed educated, informed, and empowered citizens to deploy advanced technologies and remain competitive.

Unfortunately, there’s every reason to think artificial general intelligence (AGI) will reverse that trend... Feed: https://feeds.transistor.fm/80k-after-hours
